result.html: bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romhamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé ag réitiú do mo ḃainis naċ raiḃ aċ aon lá déag roṁamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i nua-eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.html: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadhYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ aon ġá le heagarṫóir a ṫuilleaḋ le do leagan féin de ċeird na hiriseoireaċta a ċleaċtaḋYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.

result.eng: Among the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ga: i measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.orig: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.html: i measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ponchtml: i measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den ċine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.

result.eng: Although slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ga: cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na stát aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.orig: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.html: cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na stát aontaithe ba cheist lárnach íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ponchtml: cé nárḃ é an scláḃaíoċt an t-aon ċúis le cogaḋ caṫarṫa na stát aontaiṫe ba ċeist lárnaċ íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.

result.eng: They decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ga: feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.orig: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.html: feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadhThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ponchtml: feistíoḋ 'aċ aon rud ċoṁ deismir agus a féadaḋThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.orig: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.html: aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ponchtml: aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: Don't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ga: ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.orig: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.html: ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ponchtml: ná blais aon deor den ḃeoir ṁallaiṫe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: d'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: d'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: d'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.

result.eng: Nobody could recognize him.
result.ga: ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
result.orig: Ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
result.html: ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithneNobody could recognize him.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ dul ag aon duine a aiṫneNobody could recognize him.
